extendedInfo.description: Love is in the air and we wish you a love filled Valentine's Day.We present you all an awesome live wallpaper to light up the Christmas feel this festive season...a collection of some fabulous, beautiful, magnificent Christmas wallpapers with falling snow flakes and light balls....Spice up your android phone with some of the cool collection of snowy wallpapers. If you are looking for a app with coolest graphics and less battery consumption, this one is surely the best for every X-Mas.Features:1. Awesome wallpaper collection2. Fully Customizable3. Various images for the snow flakes4. Extremely user friendly5. Takes up very little battery juiceand ITS ABSOLUTELY FREE!! with every feature unlocked...Isn't this great guys?FYI: Snow fall change when you tap on the Home Screen!!Simple Guidelines:TO USE:Home -> Press Menu -> Select Wallpapers -> Select Live Wallpapers -> Select Christmas Light Live Wallpaper.Wish you all A Merry Christmas,May the Joys of the seasonFill your heart with goodwill and cheer.May the chimes of Christmas gloryAdd up more shine and spreadSmiles across the miles,To-day & In the New Year.Enjoy folks and spend the the upcoming month of love with your true love.Be it kids or adults everybody loves this awesome app. If you are looking for a app with coolest graphics, less battery consumption and free features, this is surely a Santa's treat.All suggestions are invited.Remember we are HAPPY TO HELP! :)Again, have a great Valentine's Day.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Nice background and snow fall... I love this simple and mind refreshing pics
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: Would have loved to have kept this app because the wallpapers are very nice. However, I do not want constant notifications for other apps and/or spam.
reviews.author: Kristal Aeppli
